snippet: Stephen Howells and Nicole Vaisey, a New York couple accused of kidnapping and sexual abuse, are facing additional federal charges involving more child victims, prosecutors said.
abstract: Stephen Howells and Nicole Vaisey, upstate New York couple accused of kidnapping and sexually abusing two young Amish sisters, are now facing additional federal charges involving more child victims.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Howells and Nicole Vaisey, a New York couple accused of kidnapping and sexual abuse, are facing additional federal charges involving more child victims, prosecutors said.

headline.main: More Charges of Sexual Abuse for Couple Accused of Kidnapping Two Amish Sisters
headline.print_headline: More Charges of Sex Abuse for Couple
